Topic: Geographic Redundancy (Hierarchy: Cybersecurity > 008_Application Security > 012_Database Security > Backup, Recovery, and Business Continuity > High Availability and Disaster Recovery > Geographic Redundancy). Use this content to generate flashcards: - Learning Objectives: [INSERT FULL LIST FROM ABOVE] - Active Learning: [INSERT FULL DETAILS FROM ABOVE] - Scaffolding Layers: [INSERT FULL DETAILS FROM ABOVE] - Research Context: Definitions (geo-redundancy, DR/BC/HA/Resilience), Standards (ISO 27001 A.17/A.12, NIST SP 800-53 CP family), Cloud Examples (AWS RDS multi-region, Azure Geo-Replication). Follow Bloom's Taxonomy progression, voter consensus (completeness on standards, pedagogy), and best practices (spaced repetition, active recall). Output EXACTLY as JSON array of 50 flashcards, each with: { "type": "Basic Q&A|MCQ|Cloze", "front": "...", "back": "...", "explanation": "...", "bloom_level": "Remember|Understand|Apply|Analyze|Evaluate|Create", "layer": 1|2|3|4, "tags": ["array of tags"] } Adhere to Flashcard Schema and Distractor Protocol. Ensure variety, high-quality distractors, and alignment (e.g., MCQs for Analyze/Evaluate). No extra text.
